title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Gather and analyze user requirements for the BCI system to interact with artificial neural networks.

title: Design Architecture and User Interface
description: Design the system architecture and user interface for the BCI system based on gathered requirements.

title: Develop BCI System Core Functionality
description: Develop the core functionality of the BCI system, including neural network integration.

title: Implement Database Integration
description: Implement the database integration to store and manage data related to AI training.

title: Perform Unit Testing and Debugging
description: Write unit tests for the developed components of the system, debug any issues found.

title: Deploy and Conduct Initial Testing
description: Deploy the system to a test environment, conduct initial testing, gather feedback, and resolve any issues.

title: Iterate and Improve Based on Feedback
description: Iterate on the system based on feedback from initial testing, make improvements as necessary.
